review: CREATE TABLE `review` (`review_id` SMALLINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL  DEFAULT 0, `rating_amount` SMALLINT NOT NULL  DEFAULT 0, `rating_score` INT NOT NULL  DEFAULT 0, `rating_average`FLOAT  DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (`review_id`));
childCareSystem: CREATE TABLE `childCareSystem` (`id` SMALLINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `type` VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,  `city` VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, `district` VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, `address` VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, `longitude` FLOAT NOT NULL, `latitude` FLOAT NOT NULL, `capacity` INT NOT NULL, `evaluate_year` VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL, `evaluation_type` VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL, `evaluation_result` VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, `rating_amount` SMALLINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,`rating_score` INT NOT NULL  DEFAULT 0, `rating_average`FLOAT  DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (`id`))
childMessage: CREATE TABLE `childMessage` (`id` SMALLINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,  `date` DATE NOT NULL, `message` VARCHAR(300) DEFAULT '', `rating` SMALLINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
childSystemDemand: CREATE TABLE `childSystemDemand` (`id` SMALLINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `town` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `town_id` INT NOT NULL, `year_99` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_100` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_101` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_102` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_103` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_104` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_105` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_106` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_107` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_108` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_109` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_110` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_111` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_112` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_113` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_114` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_115` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_116` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_117` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_118` SMALLINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
elderlyCareSystem: CREATE TABLE `elderlyCareSystem` (`id` SMALLINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `level` VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, `type` VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,  `city` VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, `district` VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, `address` VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, `longitude` FLOAT NOT NULL, `latitude` FLOAT NOT NULL, `rating_amount` SMALLINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,`rating_score` INT NOT NULL  DEFAULT 0, `rating_average`FLOAT  DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (`id`))
elderlyMessage: CREATE TABLE `elderlyMessage` (`id` SMALLINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,  `date` DATE NOT NULL, `rating` SMALLINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
elderlySystemDemand: CREATE TABLE `elderlySystemDemand` (`id` SMALLINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `town` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `town_id` INT NOT NULL, `year_99` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_100` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_101` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_102` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_103` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_104` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_105` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_106` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_107` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_108` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_109` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_110` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_111` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_112` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_113` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_114` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_115` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_116` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_117` SMALLINT NOT NULL, `year_118` SMALLINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
powerbi_child: CREATE TABLE `powerbi_child` (`id` SMALLINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `county` VARCHAR(5), `city` VARCHAR(5),  `district` VARCHAR(5), `town_id` SMALLINT, `longitude` FLOAT, `latitude` FLOAT, `year` TINYINT, `predict` INT, PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
powerbi_elderly: CREATE TABLE `powerbi_elderly` (`id` SMALLINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `county` VARCHAR(5), `city` VARCHAR(5),  `district` VARCHAR(5), `town_id` SMALLINT, `longitude` FLOAT, `latitude` FLOAT, `year` TINYINT, `predict` INT, PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
